about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
A pleasant river guides the beginning of your journey into this immersion. Find yourself standing in the middle of a gently flowing river encompassed by an umbrella of trees. Next enjoy as the rain falls around you slowly dancing on the lake as the sun reveals itself. Finish your relaxing experience by an exceptional garden pond, with a few playful toads.

Purpose
Relaxation
Self meditation
Wildlife

Length
10:21

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
